channel.title: Java + A New Error
channel.description:
Hello again....
I downloded the newest jdk at http://www.java.com/en/download/installed.jsp (jdk6 update 10)
I Then put in the class path [code]CLASSPATH=C:\Java6 update 10\bin;%CLASSPATH%;[/code]
And put the path [code]PATH=C:\Java6 update 10\bin; [/code]
And i still get a error... also i put in cmd in run.. to see the paths and stuff ect... And this come up [code]-jre-restrict-search i -jre-no-restrict-search include/exclude user private JRES in the version search -? -help print this help message -X pring help on non-standard options -ea[:<packagenane>...;:<classname>] -enableassertions[:<packagenane>...;:<classname>] enable assertions -da[:<packagenane>...:<classname>] -disableassertions [:<packagenane>...;:<classname>] disable assertions -esa ; -enablesystemassertions enable system assertions -dsa ; -disablesystenassertions disable system assertions -agentlib:<libname>[=<options>] load native agent library <libnane>, e.g -agentlib:hprof see also, -agentlib:jdwp-help and -agentlib:hprof=help -agentpath:<pathnane>[=<opions>] load native agent library by full pathange -javaagent:<jarpath>[=options>] load java programning language agent, see java.lang.instrument -splash:<imagepath> show splash screen with specified image -[/code] please help me of what i gotta do please

item.title: Java + A New Error
item.dc:creator: @Kalvin Kalvin
item.description:
@Kalvin wrote:

Hello again…

I downloded the newest jdk at http://www.java.com/en/download/installed.jsp (jdk6 update 10)

I Then put in the class path CLASSPATH=C:\Java6 update 10\bin;%CLASSPATH%;

And put the path PATH=C:\Java6 update 10\bin;

And i still get a error… also i put in cmd in run… to see the paths and stuff ect…
And this come up -jre-restrict-search i -jre-no-restrict-search include/exclude user private JRES in the version search -? -help print this help message -X pring help on non-standard options -ea[:<packagenane>...;:<classname>] -enableassertions[:<packagenane>...;:<classname>] enable assertions -da[:<packagenane>...:<classname>] -disableassertions [:<packagenane>...;:<classname>] disable assertions -esa ; -enablesystemassertions enable system assertions -dsa ; -disablesystenassertions disable system assertions -agentlib:<libname>[=<options>] load native agent library <libnane>, e.g -agentlib:hprof see also, -agentlib:jdwp-help and -agentlib:hprof=help -agentpath:<pathnane>[=<opions>] load native agent library by full pathange -javaagent:<jarpath>[=options>] load java programning language agent, see java.lang.instrument -splash:<imagepath> show splash screen with specified image - please help me of what i gotta do please
